about.description: Since 2017, we've been providing reliable logistics solutions across ocean, air, road and rail with a focus on visibility, speed and cost-efficiency. Our team combines global reach with local expertise to keep your cargo moving.
about.trackDescription: Stay updated from pickup to delivery with real-time tracking

hero.title: Logistics you can depend on — sea, air, road & rail
hero.subtitle: Real-time visibility, compliance, and proactive exception handling

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.description: We serve manufacturers, retailers, and distributors who need reliable, compliant logistics solutions across ocean, air, road, and rail. Our core value is transforming supply chain complexity into predictable, transparent operations that drive your business forward.
whoWeAre.bullet1: Complete visibility from origin to destination with real-time milestone tracking
whoWeAre.bullet2: Full compliance management across all regulatory requirements and trade lanes
whoWeAre.bullet3: Optimized speed and cost through strategic carrier partnerships and route planning

tracking.title: Real-time tracking
tracking.description: Complete visibility from pickup to delivery with milestone updates and exception alerts.

compliance.title: Documentation & compliance
compliance.description: Expert handling of customs, permits, and regulatory requirements across all trade lanes.

network.title: Global carrier network
network.description: Strategic partnerships with 150+ carriers ensuring capacity and competitive rates worldwide.

exception.title: 24/7 exception handling
exception.description: Proactive monitoring and immediate response to delays, disruptions, or documentation issues.

speed.title: Speed & efficiency
speed.description: Optimized routing and streamlined processes to minimize transit times and costs.

insights.title: Data-driven insights
insights.description: Analytics and reporting to optimize your supply chain performance and reduce costs.

counters.title: Our impact in numbers
counters.subtitle: Trusted by global companies to deliver consistent, reliable logistics solutions

process.title: How we work
process.subtitle: Our streamlined 5-step process ensures your cargo moves efficiently from origin to destination

step1.title: Quote & booking
step1.description: Get instant quotes and book shipments through our platform or dedicated account manager

step2.title: Documentation & compliance
step2.description: We handle all customs paperwork, permits, and regulatory requirements for your trade lane

step3.title: Pickup & consolidation
step3.description: Strategic pickup scheduling and cargo consolidation to optimize costs and transit times

step4.title: Real-time tracking
step4.description: Monitor your shipment with live updates, milestone notifications, and exception alerts

step5.title: Final delivery
step5.description: Coordinated last-mile delivery with proof of delivery and performance analytics

leadership.title: Leadership team
leadership.subtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to delivering exceptional logistics solutions

ceo.name: Sarah Chen
ceo.title: Chief Executive Officer
ceo.bio: 20+ years in global logistics, former VP at Maersk. Expert in digital transformation and sustainable supply chains.

coo.name: Michael Rodriguez
coo.title: Chief Operations Officer
coo.bio: 15+ years optimizing freight networks across Asia-Pacific. Specialized in multimodal transport solutions.

compliance.name: Dr. Emma Thompson
compliance.title: Head of Compliance
compliance.bio: Former customs official with deep expertise in international trade regulations and risk management.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your logistics?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of companies who trust us with their global supply chain. Get started with a free consultation and quote.

contact.heroDescription: Ready to streamline your logistics? Contact our expert team for personalized solutions.
contact.responseTime: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your logistics needs...
contact.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond within 24 hours.

tracking.title: Track Your Shipment
tracking.subtitle: Real-time tracking with satellite precision. Monitor containers and vessels worldwide with accurate location data.
tracking.notFoundDesc: Please check your tracking number and try again

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Practical logistics articles, market updates, and how-tos to help you ship smarter.

footer.description: Global logistics solutions with reliable ocean, air, road and rail transport services. Safe, fast delivery to every corner of the world.

servicesPage.title: Services
servicesPage.subtitle: End-to-end logistics across sea, air, road and rail—picked to fit your lane.
servicesPage.coreServicesDesc: Our core services keep your supply chain moving with clarity, speed and control.

common.shareLanesVolumes: Share lanes and volumes — we'll propose a simple, clear plan.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.heroSubtitle: Full-container & LCL solutions with global lanes, visibility and customs support.
oceanFreight.mainTitle: Move by sea with clarity and control
oceanFreight.description: Reliable FCL/LCL on core trade lanes with documented processes and straightforward handoffs. We keep paperwork simple and milestones visible so your cargo keeps moving—without overselling.

features.f2: FCL and LCL options across major lanes

fcl.title: Full Container Load (FCL)
fcl.desc: Dedicated boxes for direct routes and predictable schedules—fewer handoffs, more control.

lcl.title: Less than Container Load (LCL)
lcl.desc: Shared capacity for smaller consignments with regular cut-offs and consolidated handling.

special.title: Special Equipment
special.desc: Reefer, open-top, flat-rack, and ISO tank with route checks and handling guidance.

drayage.title: Port drayage & deconsolidation
drayage.desc: Smooth first/last-mile moves with clear handoffs to road/rail.

exception.title: Exception handling
exception.desc: Early signals for rollovers, docs, and inspections with clear actions.

dg.title: Dangerous goods (on request)
dg.desc: Route and line review with documentation guidance where applicable.

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.desc: Simple milestone tracking and on-request status summaries.

cta.title: Planning an ocean shipment?
cta.description: Share origin, destination, and estimated volumes — we'll outline a clear plan.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.heroSubtitle: Express and economy air cargo for time‑critical shipments.
airFreight.mainTitle: Move by air with speed and precision
airFreight.description: Time-critical cargo solutions with express and economy options across global routes. Reliable schedules, certified handling, and end-to-end visibility for urgent shipments.

express.title: Express Air Services
express.desc: Next-flight-out for urgent shipments with priority handling and expedited customs clearance.

economy.title: Economy Air Freight
economy.desc: Cost-effective deferred services for less time-sensitive cargo with reliable schedules.

dg.title: Dangerous Goods Handling
dg.desc: Certified handling of hazardous materials with full IATA compliance and safety protocols.

tempControl.title: Temperature Control
tempControl.desc: Climate-controlled cargo solutions for pharmaceuticals, perishables, and sensitive goods with real-time monitoring.

specialized.title: Specialized Handling
specialized.desc: Expert care for fragile, valuable, and oversized cargo with custom packaging and handling procedures.

network.title: Global Network
network.desc: Door-to-door coverage across 500+ destinations with local expertise and 24/7 customer support.

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.desc: Flight tracking and milestone updates with proactive communication and exception management.

cta.title: Ready to ship by air?
cta.description: Get competitive rates and reliable transit times for your air freight needs.

roadTransport.title: Road Transport
roadTransport.heroSubtitle: FTL/LTL across regions with optimized transit and coverage.
roadTransport.description: Flexible, reliable ground transportation across regional and international corridors.
roadTransport.quote: Delivering excellence across every mile, connecting businesses with reliable road transport solutions.

railFreight.title: Rail Freight
railFreight.heroSubtitle: Efficient intermodal rail corridors and stable lead times.
railFreight.mainTitle: Move by rail with efficiency and sustainability
railFreight.description: Reliable rail transport across major corridors with intermodal connections. Predictable schedules, lower emissions, and cost-effective solutions for high-volume shipments.

block.title: Block Train Services
block.desc: Dedicated train capacity for large volumes with direct routing and predictable schedules.

intermodal.title: Intermodal Solutions
intermodal.desc: Seamless rail-to-truck connections with optimized first and last mile delivery.

crossBorder.title: Cross-Border Rail
crossBorder.desc: International rail corridors with customs coordination and documentation support.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Transport
sustainable.desc: Lower carbon footprint compared to road transport with environmentally conscious logistics solutions.

terminal.title: Terminal Coordination
terminal.desc: Expert management of rail terminal operations, loading, and equipment positioning.

route.title: Route Optimization
route.desc: Strategic routing through major rail corridors for maximum efficiency and cost savings.

equipment.title: Equipment Management
equipment.desc: Specialized railcar types including flatcars, boxcars, and container chassis for diverse cargo needs.

cta.title: Ready to optimize with rail?
cta.description: Lower emissions and predictable lead times for your freight needs.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.heroSubtitle: Storage, consolidation and value‑added services across regions.
warehousing.description: Strategic storage and fulfillment solutions with flexible capacity and value-added services. Advanced inventory management, pick & pack operations, and cross-dock capabilities.

storage.title: Storage Solutions
storage.desc: Short-term and long-term storage options with flexible capacity and scalable solutions.

pickPack.title: Pick & Pack Services
pickPack.desc: Order fulfillment and custom packaging with advanced inventory management systems.

crossDock.title: Cross-Dock Services
crossDock.desc: Consolidation and distribution optimization for streamlined supply chain operations.

specialized.title: Specialized Facilities
specialized.desc: Temperature-controlled and bonded storage for pharmaceuticals, food, and high-value goods.

valueAdded.title: Value-Added Services
valueAdded.desc: Labeling, kitting, assembly, and custom packaging services to enhance your products.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.desc: Real-time tracking and reporting with advanced WMS integration and visibility tools.

locations.title: Strategic Locations
locations.desc: Optimally positioned facilities for efficient distribution and reduced transportation costs.

cta.title: Ready to optimize your storage?
cta.description: Flexible warehousing solutions that scale with your business needs.

multimodal.title: Multimodal Transport
multimodal.heroSubtitle: Integrated ocean/road/rail/air for optimal cost and time.
multimodal.description: Integrated transport solutions combining ocean, road, rail, and air modes. Strategic route design, seamless handovers, and end-to-end visibility for complex logistics requirements.

oceanRoad.title: Ocean-Road Combinations
oceanRoad.desc: Seamless integration of sea and land transport for cost-effective long-distance shipping.

railRoad.title: Rail-Road Solutions
railRoad.desc: Intermodal connections combining rail efficiency with road flexibility for optimal delivery.

airRoad.title: Air-Road Express
airRoad.desc: Time-critical combinations leveraging air speed with road accessibility for urgent cargo.

route.title: Route Optimization
route.desc: Strategic mode selection and route design to balance speed, cost, and reliability across transport networks.

singleWindow.title: Single-Window Operations
singleWindow.desc: Unified documentation and coordination across all transport modes for simplified logistics management.

handover.title: Handover Management
handover.desc: Expert coordination of cargo transfers between modes with risk mitigation and quality control.

visibility.title: End-to-End Visibility
visibility.desc: Complete shipment tracking across all transport modes with real-time updates and milestone reporting.

cta.title: Ready to design your route?
cta.description: We'll balance speed, cost and reliability for your specific lanes.

projectCargo.title: Project Cargo
projectCargo.heroSubtitle: Engineering and route planning for heavy and oversized loads.
projectCargo.description: Specialized project cargo solutions for heavy, oversized, and complex shipments. Engineering expertise, route planning, and end-to-end execution for challenging logistics projects.

features.f5: Heavy lift and oversized cargo handling

heavyLift.title: Heavy Lift Operations
heavyLift.desc: Specialized equipment and engineering for oversized and overweight cargo movements.

routePlanning.title: Route Planning & Surveys
routePlanning.desc: Comprehensive feasibility studies and route optimization for complex project moves.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.desc: Permits, escorts, and regulatory approvals for safe and legal transportation.

engineering.title: Engineering Solutions
engineering.desc: Custom lifting plans, load calculations, and structural analysis for complex cargo.

site.title: Site Coordination
site.desc: End-to-end project management with on-site supervision and execution oversight.

equipment.title: Specialized Equipment
equipment.desc: Access to heavy-duty trailers, cranes, and specialized handling equipment.

risk.title: Risk Management
risk.desc: Comprehensive insurance coverage and risk assessment for high-value project cargo.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Our team will design a safe and efficient move for your complex cargo.

customs.title: Customs & Compliance
customs.heroSubtitle: Navigate international trade regulations with expert customs clearance and compliance services
customs.description: Comprehensive customs solutions to keep your goods moving smoothly across borders.

documentation.title: Import/Export Documentation
documentation.desc: Complete preparation and processing of all customs documentation including commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin.

tariff.title: Tariff Classification
tariff.desc: Accurate HS code classification to ensure proper duty rates and compliance with trade regulations.

brokerage.title: Customs Brokerage
brokerage.desc: Licensed customs brokers handling clearance procedures across all Turkish ports and borders.

compliance.title: Trade Compliance
compliance.desc: Ensure compliance with international trade laws, sanctions, and export controls.

duty.title: Duty & Tax Optimization
duty.desc: Strategic advice to minimize customs duties and taxes while maintaining full compliance.

updates.title: Regulatory Updates
updates.desc: Stay informed about changing customs regulations and trade policy updates.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose DVN LOG for Customs?
whyChoose.r1: Licensed customs brokers with years of experience
whyChoose.r2: Deep knowledge of Turkish and international trade regulations
whyChoose.r3: Fast clearance times to minimize delays
whyChoose.r5: Competitive rates with no hidden fees

cta.title: Need Customs Assistance?
cta.description: Our customs experts are ready to help you navigate international trade regulations.

common.notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
